articles.author: Alessio Palumbo
articles.title: PS5 Pro Design Teased by Sony in 30th Anniversary Post; Announcement Is Inbound and Launch is Set for November - Wccftech
articles.description: Sony appears to have teased the PS5 Pro design in PlayStation's 30th anniversary post. The announcement is imminent at this point.
articles.content: Renowned leaker billbill-kun shared the first look at the PS5 Pro earlier this week, and Sony has now basically confirmed the design as part of PlayStation's 30th anniversary blog post. In the celebr… [+1826 chars]
